Random Geekery

All Pages Posts Now

Kuzu

Summary

An embeddable Graph Database using Cypher as its query language.

Jots

 
MATCH (a)-[b]->(c)
RETURN *;

Data Types

Numeric Types
Data Type Aliases Description
INT8 - signed one-byte integer
INT16 - signed two-byte integer
INT32 INT signed four-byte integer
INT64 SERIAL signed eight-byte integer
INT128 - signed sixteen-byte integer
UINT8 - unsigned one-byte integer
UINT16 - unsigned two-byte integer
UINT32 - unsigned four-byte integer
UINT64 - unsigned eight-byte integer
FLOAT REAL, FLOAT4 single-precision floating-point number
DOUBLE FLOAT8 double-precision floating-point number
BOOLEAN - true or false
UUID - UUID

Time and Date Types
Data Type Aliases Description
DATE - date in ISO-8601 format
TIMESTAMP - date and time in ISO-8601 format
INTERVAL DURATION a total time described as a string

Logical Types
Data Type Aliases Description
SERIAL - an incremental sequence of unique IDs
NODE - a node in a graph
REL - a representation in a graph
PATH - the NODE and REL components of a relationship

Other Types
Data Type Aliases Description
BLOB BYTEA arbitrary binary object up to 4K
STRUCT - map with string keys
STRING - variable-length character string
NULL - special value for unknown data
LIST - variable-length list
ARRAY - fixed-length list
VARIANT - stores RDF literals in RDF graphs
